stories.text:
The Uvalde elementary school shooting left me in shock. Apparently the killed 18 ten year old children after barricading in a classroom with them. It is pure evil as it gets.

I moved to USA 6 years ago from Europe and never was in my mind that one day I will need to explain my kids what happened yesterday and have a discussion about their safety at school.

I understand that psychopats and mentally sick people exist everywhere, so why does this happen only in the Unites States, and at a frequency of once a week?

I am interested if there was any serious analysis of this and what were the results?
stories.title: Ask HN: Why is the USA the only country with frequent mass shootings?
